member.name: M:WinCopies.GUI.IO.ExplorerControlListViewItem.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when an unhandled System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class. If the property of is defined to , tries to execute the command and, if succeeded, handles the event. Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
member.param: The that contains the event data.
